title: Elizabeth, New Jersey
summary: Elizabeth is a city and the county seat of Union County, New Jersey, United States.[18] As of the 2020 United States Census, the city had a total population of 137,298,[9][19] retaining its ranking as New Jersey's fourth most populous city, after neighboring Newark, Jersey City, and Paterson.[20] The population increased by 16,730 (13.8%) from the 120,568 counted in the 2000 Census, which had in turn increased by 10,566 (+9.6%) from the 110,002 counted in the 1990 Census.[21] The 2020 Census calculated a population of 137,298, an increase of 9.9% from the 2010 enumeration, ranking the city the 203rd-most-populous in the country.[10]
